title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, May 14, 2020
description: On this day in 1796, Dr. Edward Jenner inoculated a child with a smallpox vaccine, which was developed from cowpox. It was the first safe vaccine.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1796, Dr. Edward Jenner inoculated a child with a smallpox vaccine, which was developed from cowpox. It was the first safe vaccine.
